message: Hello Bob, I have a product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking $10000 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $10000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $8500 at this time.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, and I see your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to come down a bit to $9250, but I'm not able to go lower than that. Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8800, but that's the absolute highest I can go.
